about_the_game:
What is Clean-up Squad?


Clean-up squad is a multiplayer co-op game where you clean different types of properties with all sorts of equipment. You need to finish jobs in order to make money so that you can upgrade your equipment to perform tasks more efficiently or being able to do different types of jobs that otherwise aren't possible to do.

Two modes

You can either play the standard mode with time-limits and different challenges or if you are a more casual player or want to play alone you can also play it in a more sandboxy style, just cleaning up properties in your own pace without any time constraints.

Avoid obstacles

Some properties may be harder to clean. Watch out and bring the right equipment in case there are animals wreaking havoc or a toilet is overflowing.

name: Clean-up Squad
short_description: Assemble your friends in a squad in this satisfying and challenging cleaning game. Get paid by cleaning different types of properties by removing trash, mopping stains and doing other cleaning tasks. Upgrade your gear to be able to take on bigger projects to become the best squad out there.
